flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
一度　大声で　鳴き出すと　自分の
声に　びっくりして　さらに　激しく　鳴く。
鳴き止むと　疲れて　眠ってしまう。

Whismur is very timid. If it starts to cry loudly, it becomes
startled by its own crying and cries even harder. When it finally
stops crying, the Pokémon goes to sleep, all tired out.

Whismur è estremamente timido. Se gli capita di emettere
suoni forti, è atterrito nell’udire la sua stessa voce, quindi
urla ancora più fragorosamente. Quando finalmente si placa,
va a dormire, spossato.

Whismur es muy tímido. Si empieza a gritar fuerte, se asusta a
sí mismo y chilla más alto todavía. Cuando para por fin, se va
a dormir completamente agotado.

Flurmel ist sehr scheu. Wenn es laut brüllt, erschrickt es und
brüllt dadurch noch lauter. Wenn es schließlich damit aufhört,
ist es völlig ausgepumpt und legt sich schlafen.

Chuchmur est très timide. S’il commence à pleurer, il s’effraie
tout seul et pleure de plus belle. Quand ce Pokémon finit
enfin de pleurer, il s’endort, épuisé.

한 번 큰 소리로 울기 시작하면 자신의
목소리에 놀라 한층 더 심하게 운다.
울음을 그치면 지쳐서 잠들어버린다.

ひとたび　おおごえで　なきだすと　じぶんの
こえに　びっくりして　さらに　はげしく　なく。
なきやむと　つかれて　ねむってしまう。

普段は　注意しないと　聞き取れない　くらい
小さな　声だが　危険を　察知　すると
頭痛を　起こす　ほどの　大声で　鳴き出す。

Normally, Whismur’s voice is very quiet—it is barely audible
even if one is paying close attention. However, if this Pokémon
senses danger, it starts crying at an earsplitting volume.

Normalmente la voce di Whismur è molto tenue, quasi
impercettibile, anche se ci si concentra. Tuttavia,
se questo Pokémon percepisce un pericolo, inizia
a emettere suoni assordanti.

Normalmente, Whismur tiene una voz tenue, casi inaudible,
aunque se preste atención. No obstante, si este Pokémon
siente que el peligro acecha, puede ponerse a chillar con un
volumen ensordecedor.

Normalerweise ist Flurmels Stimme sehr leise,
selbst mit größter Anstrengung ist sie kaum hörbar.
Wenn dieses Pokémon jedoch eine Gefahr wittert,
stößt es ohrenbetäubende Schreie aus.

Généralement, la voix de Chuchmur est très douce, à peine
audible, même si on tend l’oreille. Pourtant, lorsque
ce Pokémon sent l’approche du danger, il se met à crier
si fort qu’il peut déchirer des tympans.

평소에는 주의를 기울여야 들릴 만큼
작은 목소리지만 위험을 감지하면
두통을 일으킬 만큼 큰 소리로 울어댄다.

ふだんは　ちゅういしないと　ききとれない　くらい
ちいさな　こえだが　きけんを　さっち　すると
ずつうを　おこす　ほどの　おおごえで　なきだす。

危険を　察知すると　ジェット機と
同じ　音量の　鳴き声を　上げて
敵を　ひるませるのだ。

If it senses danger, it scares the foe by crying out
with the volume of a jet-plane engine.

Se sospetta un pericolo, leva grida agli stessi
assordanti decibel di un jet, gettando nel panico i
nemici.

Cuando percibe peligro, lanza gritos con volumen
similar al de un reactor e intimida a sus enemigos.

Sein Schrei ist so laut wie ein Düsenflugzeug.
Bei Gefahr vertreibt es damit seine Feinde.

Il repousse ses ennemis grâce à un cri aussi puissant
que le bruit d’un avion à réaction.

위험을 감지하면 제트기와
같은 음량의 울음소리를
내서 적을 풀죽게 한다.

きけんを　さっちすると　ジェットきと
おなじ　おんりょうの　なきごえを
あげて　てきを　ひるませるのだ。

普段は　ささやき　声。危険を
察知すると　大声で　泣き出す。
耳の　蓋を　閉じると　泣きやむ。

It usually murmurs but starts crying
loudly if it senses danger. It stops
when its ear covers are shut.

Di solito sussurra, ma se avverte un pericolo lancia
grida acute, che interrompe quando ha le orecchie
chiuse.

Normalmente murmulla, pero cuando siente que hay
peligro se pone a chillar. Solo para cuando se le
cierran las orejas.

Normalerweise murmelt es, aber bei Gefahr beginnt
es laut zu schreien. Es hört auf zu schreien,
wenn seine Ohrmuscheln bedeckt werden.

Il communique en murmurant, mais se met à hurler
s’il sent le moindre danger. Il s’arrête quand on lui
bouche les oreilles.

평소에는 속삭이는 듯한 목소리다. 위험을
감지하면 큰 소리로 울기 시작한다.
귀의 덮개를 닫으면 울음을 멈춘다.

ふだんは　ささやき　ごえ。きけんを
さっちすると　おおごえで　なきだす。
みみの　ふたを　とじると　なきやむ。

Usually, its cries are like quiet
murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks
at the same volume as a jet plane.

Usually, its cries are like quiet
murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks
at the same volume as a jet plane.

Usually, its cries are like quiet
murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks
at the same volume as a jet plane.

En temps normal, son cri est pareil
à un murmure. Effrayé, il atteint le
volume d’un avion à réaction.

Usually, its cries are like quiet
murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks
at the same volume as a jet plane.

En temps normal, son cri est pareil
à un murmure. Effrayé, il atteint le
volume d’un avion à réaction.

If it senses danger, it scares
the foe by crying out with the
volume of a jet-plane engine.

If it senses danger, it scares
the foe by crying out with the
volume of a jet-plane engine.

Usually, its cries are like quiet
murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks
at the same volume as a jet plane.

Usually, its cries are like quiet
murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks
at the same volume as a jet plane.

Usually, its cries are like quiet
murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks
at the same volume as a jet plane.

It usually murmurs, but starts crying
loudly if it senses danger. It stops when
its ear covers are shut.

It usually murmurs, but starts crying
loudly if it senses danger. It stops when
its ear covers are shut.

Its cries equal a jet plane in volume.
It inhales through its ear canals. Because
of this system, it can cry continually
without having to catch its breath.

WHISMUR is very timid. If it starts to
cry loudly, it becomes startled by its
own crying and cries even harder. When it finally stops crying, the
POKéMON goes to sleep, all tired out.

Normally, WHISMUR’s voice is very quiet -
it is barely audible even if one is
paying close attention. However, if this POKéMON senses danger,
it starts crying at an earsplitting
volume.
